alert.note: Alert for Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Southern Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 03 at 9:38PM CDT until October 04 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Minor coastal flooding expected. Tides running around 1 to 1.5 feet above predicted astronomical tide levels. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Southern Calcasieu, Lower Iberia and Lower St. Mary Parishes. In Texas, Southern Orange County. * WHEN...Until 9 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected.
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Lower Iberia; Lower St. Mary; Southern Calcasieu
